recommendations: Aryan Mehta “Anubhav is one of those folks anyone would like to have in their team. He is an all round product manager who has expertise in stakeholder management, process development , agile methodologies and an unique ability of improving UX experience which brings great business outcomes . He has always that hunger to learn new skills to be a better product manager than he was yesterday. He is a leader , a friend and a guide every team or individual would like to work with.”
Kaustubh Ambedkar “Anubhav is proficient at simultaneously managing the people and project evenly to navigate project success. He is very collaborative in his approach to deliver quality on time.”

volunteer_experience.info: HBR Ascend Select is an exclusive and an invite-only community of aspiring leaders, handpicked by HBR Ascend. As a member, I get the opportunity to share my views and opinions with the editorial, marketing and product teams of HBR Ascend. I also participate in various research projects led by HBR Ascend.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Harvard Business Review
volunteer_experience.title: HBR Ascend Select Member

projects: [{"title":"Trading Opportunities in Cotton Commodities in the Indian Market","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Worked on understanding the investment, hedging and spread trading opportunities across various derivatives of cotton - Bale, Kapas and Seed Oil Futures, trading at NCDEX and MCX. Compared the efficiency of NCDEX vs MCX."},{"title":"Crypto Assets, Commodity Derivatives and VIX Research ","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"A research work on assessing the fundamental relationship between the Volatility Index and the Commodity Options Pricing in the Indian Market.Developed a financial model describing the effect of Spillovers, Causality and Co-movements on the hedging characteristics of Gold, Crude Oil and Bitcoin."},{"title":"Alpha Generation and Market Timing Analysis of Mutual Funds","start_date":"Mar 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Analysed Indian share market stand of broadly classified mutual funds offered by companies and their returns before and after the fall of market. Quantified the profits generated by each category of funds with the diversification and market timing ability of fund managers.Built and applied GARCH based financial model for the study of the market timing of the fund managers."}]
